sect2.title: FunctionFinder-TokenFinder
sect2.para: The FunctionFinder-TokenFinder can find all tokens which are part of a function or method.
The Starttoken is the T_FUNCTION-token of a function.
The end can be the closing curly brace (}) for normal functions and methods or the semicolon (;) for anonymous functions (Closures), abstract methods or methods in interfaces.
The $params-parameter allows to pass in an array with the following 2 keys:

para.literallayout: includeMethodProperties -> if it should include tokens in front of the T_FUNCTION like public/private/protected or static and abstract. includePhpdoc -> if should include the methods phpdoc
